title: No successful completions in T2_edit (no-JS mode)
problem: Users with JS disabled cannot complete edit tasks due to missing error feedback
proposed_fix: Implement server-rendered error summaries with auto-focus for no-JS

title: Validation errors unannounced to screen readers
problem: Screen reader users cannot identify validation errors in JS-on mode (violates WCAG 4.1.3)
proposed_fix: Add role="alert" and aria-live="assertive" to error containers

title: Significant T1_filter delay in no-JS mode
problem: No-JS users experience 71% slower completion due to full page reloads
proposed_fix: Optimize server-side caching for filter results

title: 20% error rate in T3_delete (JS-on mode)
problem: Occasional accidental deletions due to unclear confirmation prompts
proposed_fix: Add explicit "Confirm Delete" button with aria-label

title: Inconsistent success feedback across tasks
problem: No standardized success messages, causing user uncertainty (violates WCAG 3.3.1)
proposed_fix: Implement consistent success banners with role=""status""
